transform_def.name: its_a_trap
transform_def.string: let s1 = vec2(unit_rnd_0 - 0.5, unit_rnd_1 - 0.5) r1 = length(s1) a1 = atan2(s1.y, s1.x) + quartpi() s2 = vec2(cos(a1), sin(a1)) * r1 c = if (s2.x < 0.0 || s2.x > mx) then vec2(cos(r1), sin(r1)) else s2 r2 = length(c) * weight a2 = atan2(c.y, c.x) - quartpi() in vec2(cos(a2), sin(a2)) * r2
